metadata.name: TurboToad Arcade
metadata.description:
Play as TurboToad and collect coins from Mom's basement, the burger joint and finally the spaceport. Face the boss frog, then take the rocket ship to the moon!

Starting from scratch, no templates, no ready-made game frameworks, no off-the-shelf assets. 

One of the world's first arcade-style games created entirely with AI tools. Code developed by chatGPT4, graphics by Midjourney, music by Soundraw.io.

Created May 2023.

Funds raised will go towards further development of the game engine (with chatGPT helping out), including high scores, extra levels, choice of difficulties, new characters and more.

[View full screen](https://5xx67nn6xeelglaxhglkynk6g5j4qlrvnxilpmtjwtjp374mb42q.arweave.net/7e_vtb65CLMsFzmWrDVeN1PILjVt0LeyabTS_f-MDzU/)
